document.full_text: saudi authorities arrested a female activist on sunday who launched a campaign to challenge a ban on women driving in the conservative kingdom and posted a video on the internet of her driving, activists said.
document.title: saudi woman arrested for challenging driving ban
lines_and_colors: saudi authorities arrested a female activist on sunday who launched a campaign to challenge a ban on women driving in the conservative kingdom and posted a video on the internet of her driving, activists said.
